Welcome to Slutspurt’s documentation!¶

app.addUser()¶

Submits user info to get inserted into to database table

Returns

redirects you back to the /user route

Return type

route

app.delete(_id)¶

Submits a form where the users gets deleted from the database table ]

Parameters

_id (Integer) – The function uses the id of the user to find all the information and then deletes it

Return

It redirects you to /user route

app.getUser()¶

Get all users form database

Returns

Renders a template that has a list of all users

app.get_edit(_id)¶

Renders a form where you can update a users information

Parameters

_id (Integer) – The function uses the id of the user to find all the informatio

Returns

It returns a function that already has a users information filed in

app.index()¶

Redirects you to /user route

app.serve_sphinx_docs(path='build/html/index.html')¶

Renders a page where you can find all the documentation]

Parameters

path (str, optional) – defaults to ‘index.html’

Return

Documention

app.show()¶

Shows all users

Return

returns a template with a list of all users

app.submit_edit(_id)¶

Submits a form where all changes to the user is updated in database table

Parameters

_id (Integer) – The function uses the id of the user to find all the information

Return

It redirects you to /user route
